name: G3 Alpinist+ Grip Skins
description: The ultimate tool for steep and icy skin tracks. The high-traction nylon plush provides improved grip for those situations where regular skins won't cut it. As on other Alpinist+ skins, the stiff tip creates a rigid platform that prevents the snow from creeping under your skins. The minimalist tail clip keeps the weight low while retaining the camming mechanism to lock it into place.Tail connector has a pop up design for fast changes with gloves on.Tip connectors have self-aligning steel hands for security.RipStrip makes pulling apart skins easier, and can be removed for added traction in case of adhesion contamination.Hydrophobic water treatment prevents snow or ice clumping.Non-toxic, PFOA-free adhesive is functional to -30C.Trim tool included.
